site_name: LINDA K. AND C. SCOTT JUSTASON

citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 2:20 PM on
12/15/2015. The inspector knocked at the front door of the residence, called the cell phone number provided and
waited on the property for 30 minutes.

narrative:
2.126(b)                    REPEAT
ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 2:20 PM on
12/15/2015. The inspector knocked at the front door of the residence, called the cell phone number provided and
waited on the property for 30 minutes.
